section.44: The Book of the Merits of the Companions

hadiths.text: Abu Huraira reported Allah's Messenger (ï·º) as saying:Good amongst the women are those who ride camels. One of them said: They are pious women of the Quraish, and the other one said: The women of the Quraish are kind to the orphans in their childhood and look after the wealth of their spouses
